en.meta_desc_home: RC:CM is a game development studio. Learn more about our game RC Car Maniacs and stay up to date with the latest news.
en.meta_desc_about: Learn more about the RC:CM development team, our history, and our mission.
en.meta_desc_contact: Contact the RC:CM team via Discord or Email. We‚Äôre open to communication!
en.hero_subtitle_alt:
Follow our social networks to read the latest
news about the project!
en.game_card_title: Go to RC Car Maniacs page on Steam
en.game_description: RC:CM is an exciting arcade simulator of radio‚Äìcontrolled cars, which will allow you to plunge into the world of children's fantasies, driving radio-controlled cars: rally, drift, high-speed and other types of cars! Race with your friends!
en.gameplay_sound_desc: Detailed sounds of each track surface. Realistic sound environment. The soundtracks written for the game create a unique atmosphere.
en.gameplay_multiplayer_desc: Create your own online servers. Play with friends and with different people from all over the world. Arrange competitions and full-fledged races.
en.gameplay_physics_desc: Advanced physics engine. The surface of the track in different sections affects the level of grip. Different types of engines: Electric and Gasoline Detailed modeling of the suspension of cars, which adjusts to the surface.
en.gameplay_weather_desc: Advanced weather change. Deterioration or improvement of ride quality due to different weather conditions. The choice of different conditions: Day, Night, Autumn, Summer, Winter.
en.footer_copyright: Copyright 2025 by "GH Games" | All rights reserved | Gmail: ghgamesdev@gmail.com
en.about_history_desc: GH Games was founded by a group of passionate and experienced game developers who shared a common dream of creating exciting and unforgettable gaming experiences. Since our founding, we have been committed to pushing the boundaries of creativity and innovation in the gaming industry.
en.about_team_desc: RC:CM has a talented team, each member of which plays a key role in bringing our idea to life. Meet Max, our dedicated team leader, an all-round expert in 3D modeling and Unreal Engine 5 development. Next to him is Anton, a brilliant UE5 programmer who make sure the technical aspects of our games are top notch. Pavel, our talented designer and artist-musician, adds his creativity to every aspect of our projects.
en.about_vision_desc: The ultimate goal is to release a brilliant game that will melt the hearts of our players. We see RC:CM as a driving force in the gaming industry, inspiring positive change and setting new standards of excellence.
en.dev_wdfr_desc: In the past I have done 2D graphics for games / Worked with different game engines / Making 3D models since 2018, Worked as a freelancer making models to order for printing / In 2017 together with Parker came up with and launched GH Games. Mainly known as _ghost_mjjn_[WDFR] since it's a main nickname.
en.dev_parker_desc: Programmer, Social Promotion Helper. An old friend of ghostWDFR. Knows 12 languages, but won‚Äôt reveal their own name. Probably a bot. ü§ñ
en.dev_evenly_desc: In the past, I worked on video editing and 3D effects, I am a Performer / Beatmaker / Distributor, Since 2017 I have been making designs for websites / covers / Styles, Worked as a freelancer, making music and 3D visualization for videos, In 2022, he got into GH Games by acquaintance with ghostWDFR.
en.dev_wally_desc: He works behind the scenes, quietly shaping ideas that echo through the system.
en.contact_questions_desc: If you have any questions or any suggestions: Join in our Discord and write your message based on rules in pinned message. Special channel for that purposes is: #contact-channel
en.contact_offers_desc: If you have any commercial offers or suggestions: Type a message on our Mail please. Our mail is:

de.gameplay_physics_desc: Fortschrittliche Physik-Engine. Die Oberfl√§che der Strecke beeinflusst in verschiedenen Abschnitten den Grip. Verschiedene Motortypen: Elektrisch und Benzin Detaillierte Modellierung der Fahrzeugaufh√§ngung, die sich an die Oberfl√§che anpasst.
